purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of AI-driven NFTs on various blockchain platforms.
principle: Utilizes TypeScript and smart contract interactions to manage NFT lifecycle and multichain compatibility.
reusability: Offers a modular toolkit with APIs for integrating AI-NFT functionalities into existing blockchain projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, potentially unstable and limited to supported blockchain networks.
name: mcv
description: A toolkit to launch your AI-NFT on multichain.
highlight: Enables the launch and management of AI-NFTs across multiple blockchain networks.
